import React, { useContext } from "react"; import CartContext from "./context/cart/CartContext"; import AuthContext from "./context/auth/Context"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const { logout, logedin } = useContext(AuthContext); const { cart } = useContext(CartContext); return (
{!logedin ? (
) : (
)}
{cart === null ? 0 : cart.length}
); }; export default Header;
